main event: Observers in Nashville, Tennessee, reported seeing two orange-hued parallel lines of light moving slowly across the sky.
interesting points: The phenomenon was described as resembling flying saucers or meteors., The lights were seen at a high altitude and for a great distance., Everett Derry, a local weatherman, noted the streaks reflected light., Many witnesses included both farm and town locals., Despite various theories, no definitive explanation was provided by experts.
sighted object: two orange-hued parallel lines of light
witness description: local residents including a weatherman from a Nashville radio station
